snippet.title: Miyamori Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Follow our progress on Twitter: https://twitter.com/qkjosh/ and Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/miyamorigame/
Sign up for our monthly mailing list on the main website: https://www.miyamorigame.com/

Miyamori, the 2D action-adventure platformer game set in rural Japan is coming to Kickstarter this October! 
Take turns playing as Suzume and Izuna to investigate a series of strange events and purify the land of mischievous spirits.
